meanings.definition: An official in a church responsible for the maintenance of church property.
meanings.sent1: The churchwardens ensured the church building was well-kept.
meanings.sent2: The churchwardens organized repairs for the church roof.
meanings.sent3: The churchwardens joked about having to dust the old church pews.
meanings.sent4: The churchwardens were the guardians of the church's treasures.
meanings.sent5: The churchwardens diligently cared for the church's belongings.

meanings.definition: A person appointed to assist in the management of a church.
meanings.sent1: The churchwardens helped with church events and activities.
meanings.sent2: The churchwardens supported the priest in church matters.
meanings.sent3: The churchwardens playfully argued over who would make the church announcements.
meanings.sent4: The churchwardens were the right-hand people in church administration.
meanings.sent5: The churchwardens were vital members of the church's leadership team.
